abstract: Israel announces that it has reached an agreement with Egypt for the release of Ilan Grapel, American law student from Queens who also holds Israeli citizenship; Grapel, who was arrested in Egypt in June and charged with spying for Israel, is to be exchanged for 25 Egyptians held in Israeli jails.
snippet: Israel reached an agreement with Egypt for the release of Ilan Grapel of Queens, who also holds Israeli citizenship.
lead_paragraph: Israel reached an agreement with Egypt for the release of Ilan Grapel of Queens, who also holds Israeli citizenship.

headline.main: Israel Reaches Deal for Release of an American Held in Egypt
headline.print_headline: Israel Reaches Deal for Release Of an American Held in Egypt
headline.seo: Israel Reaches Deal With Egypt for Release of Ilan Grapel
